intro: Psychotria euosma, commonly known as the "Amazonian psychotria," is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly the Amazon rainforest. The plant is characterized by its dark green, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white flowers. It produces small, red berries that contain the seeds. Psychotria euosma is often found in shaded, humid environments and plays a role in the ecological diversity of its habitat.
